translation.about: Passionate about art in all its forms: From painting, architecture, music to video games and graphic design. I'm focused on developing my web programming skills. My goal is to create engaging and exciting web experiences that are captivating, diverse and accessible. During my training and professional experience I have developed my ability to work as a team. I am a hard worker with initiative and involvement in the objectives to be achieved, resolute and communicative both in dealings with colleagues and in customer service. I'm meticulous in my work and very organized.
translation.contact: I would love to tell you more about myself.
